show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
When last minute technical difficulties kept my guest from connecting, I devoted the hour to my forthcoming… book, Guilt, Shame and Anxiety:  Understanding and Overcoming Negative Emotions.    I talk about the roots of what I call “negative legacy emotions” in biological evolution and childhood, with the aim of achieving emotional freedom!  Out on December 4, it can now be purchased in advance on Amazon.
com.
